Detailed Description

The algorithm class is the base class of algorithms It provides the common interface for all algorithms

void Algorithm::collectEstimates (  EventList &  eventList  ) 
 

This function collects scatter, randoms, yhat and livetime_decay estimate per iteration and writes this into the FrameInfo file

Parameters:
eventlist stores the events
Returns:
none

) 
 

This function performs the forward and back projection of an event when x is the primary direction

lambda lambda image
nu nu image

resFunU resolution function at U direction
params the instantance of Params class, which contains parameters needed
duration duration of the frame
omega the array to provide solid angle correction
Returns:
none

00355   //cout<<normFct<<" Y primary"<<endl;
00356 
00357   x = event.secondaryStart;
00358   z = event.zStart;
00359   for(jy=event.jstart; jy<=event.jstop; jy++){
00360 
00361     jxCentral = (int)(x);//we have maken sure that floor(x)>=0
00362     jzCentral = (int)(z);//we have maken sure that floor(z)>=0
00363     dxCentral = jxCentral+0.5-x; //+0.5 to transfer image index 
00364                                  //to image coordinate system
00365     dzCentral = jzCentral+0.5-z;
00366     table.secondaryStart = jxCentral - downXSpread;//int
00367     if(table.secondaryStart<0) {
00368       table.secondaryStart=0;
00369     }
00370     table.secondaryStop = jxCentral + upXSpread;
00371     if(table.secondaryStop>params.geometry.nX-1){
00372       table.secondaryStop=params.geometry.nX-1;
00373     }
00374     table.zStart = jzCentral - downZSpread;
00375     if(table.zStart<0){
00376       table.zStart=0;
00377     }
00378     table.zStop = jzCentral + upZSpread;
00379    if(table.zStop > params.geometry.nZ-1){
00380      table.zStop=params.geometry.nZ-1;
00381    }
00382    dRStart = (dxCentral - downXSpread) * event.cosphi;
00383    dUStart = (dzCentral - downZSpread) * event.costheta;
00384 
00385    //calculate the kernel of resolution function R
00386    for(jx=table.secondaryStart; jx<=table.secondaryStop; jx++){  
00387      for(jz=table.zStart; jz <= table.zStop; jz++) {    
00388    
00389        float kernel =  resFunRTable[jy][jx]*resFunUTable[jy][jz];
00390         
00391        nu.z[jy][jz][jx] +=kernel* normFct*omega[jy] ;
00392       
00393      }
00394    }
00395    //next 
00396    x += event.secondaryStep;
00397    z += event.zStep;
00398   }
00399 }

virtual void Algorithm::reconstruct (  Image &  lambda,
Image &  Q,
Image &  mu,
House *  house,
EventList &  eventList,
Params &  params,
Array3D< char > &  lambdaMask
)  [pure virtual]
 

This function is the virtual function for reconstruction Each algorithm will overide this function

Parameters:
lamda the lamda image
params Instance of Params class, inited from the xml file
eventlist stores the events
house instance of House class, where the events are read in
status instance of Status class
lambdaMask masks output lambda image
Returns:
none

Implemented in AlgorithmOSEM, and AlgorithmSimulation.
